post.body: http://twitpic.com/rujc - that's an amazing shot
cause i am going through folders looking for some other good ones
is it over kill?
yes...i have taken all these pics...i changed my screen name and all my pics were lost...just havin some fun here...LOL
are you busy scribbling? i certainly hope so...you'd make my day.
Thanks! In my humble opinion...i agree! LOL!
http://twitpic.com/rugh this is my favorite pic that i have ever taken of you...will you PLEASE scribble it? PRETTY PLEASE!
well hello there
so...you haven't said...do you LOVE my sentences? do you share my LOVE of the band?
me either...using agave justifies the sweet for me these days
it is fun...i won the first day i played...now i am playing to increase my memory on my winnings...check out his page
http://twitpic.com/sbwv - i saw that too while walking with jaime (dmbmedic) and vicki
I can't see it here yet...will have a gander after the sun sets
Thank you...I could not be more ecstatic.
Thank you...I guess I missed you last night...hope your Friday was wonderful!
Hello...Beautiful Being. Is it Monday yet? I am dying with anticipation.
oh...i am super cool...and i happen to be up as well...but it is before 11 here
so how is kent these days?
forget christmas..forget my 32nd bday..BRING SPRING...can you help me with this? Yes, I just got the news! Just give me a min
I WISH I could share a coffee and chat with Dave Matthews. (As always...I love your word game.)
thanks allan...i appreciate it
thank you...5th row
everybody looks so sad in the 2009 promo pic...rightfully so...i cannot imagine the hole left...i am so sorry..sending u LOVE
You make my heart happy...thank you!
Oh Dave...I LOVED today too...I was extended the job offer I was praying for...AND there is a spring tour...WOW..I LOVE TODAY
it must be the guilt from the failure to scribble on the pic i asked you to...it's OK...you can make it right...LOL!
morning scotty...have you found the pic i sent you last night? i sent it to dave and while posting..i saw you staring back
Enjoy your adventure!
WACK (the sound of my shoe)...and I'm not even a violent person...LOL!
It is Monday somewhere...just sayin
hello...hello!
Good Morning! Hope your day is full of love and laughter.
http://twitpic.com/ruk7 - this is another one of my favorite Dave memories that I captured with the lens
http://twitpic.com/ruje - "...all you need is...all you want it..."
http://twitpic.com/ruis - ...something's gotta change.
http://twitpic.com/ruia - ...is the heartbeat of my life
http://twitpic.com/rui4 - "Don't believe in anything simply because you have heard it" Buddha
http://twitpic.com/ruh4 - WISH BIG BUSINESS FOLLOWED THIS MOTTO
http://twitpic.com/rugh -
http://twitpic.com/rufw - ...and your ass will follow
http://twitpic.com/rufp - pure passion
where's all the lovely twitters tonight?
OMG...is everybody else as ecstatic about the spring tour as me???
SPRING TOUR....am i the only one shitting my pants now...don't pinch me if i am dreaming
OMG...it is Monday somewhere.
